item.description:
Welcome to Social Fun. Glad you found our group, of fun, friendly members with an age range from 21 to 55+, whether single, married, attached, kids, pets, or not, we welcome you to our group. We enjoy local social activities like: dining, movies, talks, parties, wine tasting, hikes, Art & Culture, music, happy hours, game & trivia nights, dancing, adventures, social networking, etc.  enjoying the good life in the Boson Area.

We are the mostactive Meetup group in the world, running 40+events monthly. We are a large, 5000+ member, group with a friendly close knit feel since there are 50+ Organizers to run events locally. Average event size is 20, providing you the pleasant real life experience to make life long lasting friendships possible and maybe more.

We want everyone to feel welcome, and that means we are committed to having everyone feel comfortable, as well as safe.  If it's your first time to one of our events, please don't be afraid that you won't know anyone.  We will make sure you are welcome.

Together we’ll have new experiences, explore new places, try new things and enjoy all that the Boston area has to offer. Whatever your interests, you will find an event for you in this group.

We look forward to meeting you. Sign up today for an event and have fun.  It will be one of the best choices you have ever made. Now get out and enjoy some Social Fun.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is NOT a dating group, although 90% of the members are single that is not the focus of the group. This group is about making friendships. Dating does evolve and we’ve had over 25 members that have either gotten married, engaged or are in a comment long lasting relationships. This is directly attributed to the relaxed, no pressure group setting we have created and it is nice to know we have brought so many couples together too.

Costs: To join the group and attend most events is basically FREE, but we ask if you enjoy the group, help us keep it going by making a $10 annual donation to cover the costs associated with running such a large group like paying off the Meetup fees of $144/year.

To join/stay in this group ALL Members are required to have a recent real clear main profile photo of themselves or they will not be allowed to join this group or removed for lacking this photo. Photo help can be found here:

http://www.meetup.com/help/How-do-I-add-and-manage-my-photos/

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Only members can change their e-mial settings. Please follow details in this link below:

http://www.meetup.com/help/How-do-I-edit-my-group-email-settings/ 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

   Social Fun Credo:

Social Fun Members Credo

1. Participate in Social Fun to have fun and make new friends. Please do not create drama.

2. Must have a completed profile with a clear, recent photo and profile information.

3. RSVP "YES" only when they are 100% sure they can attend.

4. Arrive on time and never "No Show." Members who "No Show" take away RSVP slots from other members and negatively impact Social Fun events.

5. Understand that after 3 'No Shows' over 3 months any AO WILL remove you from Social Fun

6. Are the ONLY ones capable of changing their Meetup Announcement e-mail settings. Social Fun Organizers cannot set these.

 

Social Fun Organizers Credo

7. Take attendance at events.

8. May disallow members with 2 or more "No Show" marks from attending their events.

9. Post events on a first come, first served basis.

10. May contact Biagio or other organizers for help.

 

==================================================

DISCLAIMER: During all events, Members are  responsible for themselves. The Organizer and Assistant Organizers are not responsible for the safety of the participants. We will try our best to prevent accidents, but are not responsible or liable if something happens to you. By joining the group, you acknowledge this. Thanks
item.name: Social Fun
